T02D2665:132a-0: @132a ` // rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bzhugs /
T02D2665:132a-2: # // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2665:132a-3: rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho gas dam tshig mnos
T02D2665:132a-4: pa'i sngags pas de las 'byung ba'i sngags rjes su
T02D2665:132a-5: dran par bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa mdor bshad
T02D2665:132a-6: pa'i phyir 'di brtsams te de'i rim pa ni 'di'o
T02D2665:132a-7: // des dang por dam tshig ji ltar mnos pa
T02D2665:132a-8: bsrung ba la 'bad par bya ste de la dam
T02D2665:132a-9: // tshig ni 'di'o // sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2665:132a-10: sems dpa' rnams dang de dag gi phyag rgya dang
T02D2665:132a-11: sngags rnams dang theg pa chen po mchog gi chos
T02D2665:132b-0: dang de ston pa'i bla ma rnams la smad @132b
T02D2665:132b-1: // tshig ni 'di'o // par mi bya'o // sangs
T02D2665:132b-2: rgyas la sogs pa 'di rnams nams kyang mi gtong
T02D2665:132b-3: // tshig ni 'di'o // par mi bya'o // ngo
T02D2665:132b-4: // de dag las rtag par sems rab tu dang
T02D2665:132b-5: bas yon tan du bzung ba dang /
T02D2665:132b-6: gus pa dang mchod pa dang mnyes par bya ba la ni ci nus su yang 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-7: 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2665:132b-8: dang de dag gi chos dang mkhan po dang slob
T02D2665:132b-9: dpon dang bla ma gzhan rnams dang bde bar gshegs
T02D2665:132b-10: pa'i bslab pa'i chos spyad pa bar ma dang gsar
T02D2665:132b-11: bu gzhan rnams la yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-12: de dag la yang dus ji lta ba dang /
T02D2665:132b-13: ji ltar rigs par rim gror yang bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-14: lha dang bla ma la byis pa'i chos nyid dang khong khro ba mi bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-15: 'jig rten gyi lha la sogs pa la yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-16: byang chub kyi sems rin po che phun sum tshogs
T02D2665:132b-17: pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa srog bzhin
T02D2665:132b-18: du rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-19: sems can thams cad la yang byams pa dang snying
T02D2665:132b-20: rje bskyed nas de dag gi gnod pa bzlog pa
T02D2665:132b-22: de dag gis gnod pa byas pa la yang bzod par bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-23: zad zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2665:132b-24: chos kyi sbyin pas ji ltar rigs par sems can
T02D2665:132b-25: rnams la rtag par ci nus su phan gdags par
T02D2665:132b-26: bya ste de bas na 'jug pa ni rgyang ring
T02D2665:132b-28: dam tshig med pa la phyag rgya dang sngags mi bstan /
T02D2665:132b-29: dam tshig can la yang lung med par mi bstan to //
T02D2665:132b-30: ma rung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba chang mi btung bar nan tan cher bya'o //
T02D2665:132b-31: mdor na gang bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa de
T02D2665:132b-32: ni mi bya'i bdag dang gzhan la phan pa 'ba'
T02D2665:132b-34: khri la nyal bar mi bya ste de ni dam tshig go //
T02D2665:132b-35: de nas bar chad med cing ring po mi thogs
T02D2665:132b-36: par tshe 'di nyid la sgrib pa zad par bya
T02D2665:132b-37: ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D2665:132b-38: bla ma las sngags gang yang rung ba cig ji lta ba bzhin du mnos te /
T02D2665:132b-39: sngags ji ltar mnos pa bslabs pas sangs rgyas dang
T02D2665:132b-40: byang chub sams dpa' mnyes par bya ba'i phyir sngags
T02D2665:132b-41: kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gong
T02D2665:132b-43: gnas dben pa 'du 'dzi med pa 'tshe ba med
T02D2665:132b-44: pa 'phrod pa'i ri phug gam sul lam nags la
T02D2665:132b-45: sogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas dang
T02D2665:133a-1: dang 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams
T02D2665:133a-2: bzhugs bzhugs pa'am gtsug lag khang dang khang pa la
T02D2665:133a-3: sogs pa ji skad smos pa dang ldan par tshad
T02D2665:133a-4: med ba bzhi bsgoms pa'i sems kyis 'du 'dzi med
T02D2665:133a-5: par chos kyi dga' ba'i longs spyod la dad pa
T02D2665:133a-6: bskyed de blo dang spro ba dang sems dpa' ba
T02D2665:133a-7: phun sum tshogs pa mchog dang ldan par byas la
T02D2665:133a-8: gnod pa thams cad la ji mi snyam zhing dge
T02D2665:133a-9: bar 'tsho ba dang ldan pas dga' bar gnas par
T02D2665:133a-10: bya'o // der gnas nas blo brtan pas nang par
T02D2665:133a-11: langs nas dgra'i 'khor ma lus par spangs la snying
T02D2665:133a-12: rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa bsgral ba
T02D2665:133a-13: rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pas khrus byas
T02D2665:133a-14: kyang rung ma byas kyang rung nges pa med de
T02D2665:133a-15: bya'o // / dge bar spyad pa mtshan nyid ji
T02D2665:133a-16: skad bsgrags pa'i nang gi khrus byed pas sa gzhi
T02D2665:133a-17: gtsang mar dkyil 'khor me tog gis gtor bar sku
T02D2665:133a-18: gzugs sam mchod rten nam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs
T02D2665:133a-19: bam gang yang rung ba cig mdun du bzhag gam
T02D2665:133a-20: bya'o // / / sku gzugs la sogs pa med
T02D2665:133a-21: kyang rung ste shar phyogs sam byang phyogs su bltas
T02D2665:133a-22: nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
T02D2665:133a-23: rab tu dang ba bskyed de de dag ji ltar
T02D2665:133a-24: rigs par phyogs bcur mngon sum bzhin du dmigs la
T02D2665:133a-25: phyag bya ba la sogs pa'i cho gas bdag yongs
T02D2665:133a-26: su sbyangs pa 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D2665:133a-27: de dag gi rim pa ni 'di'o //
T02D2665:133a-28: dang por sngags pas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
T02D2665:133a-29: te rim gro bskyed la gus par phyag 'di ltar
T02D2665:133a-30: bya'o // phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D2665:133a-31: khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D2665:133a-32: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i
T02D2665:133a-34: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun du bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2665:133a-35: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs
T02D2665:133a-36: te thal mo sbyar nas btud de bsam pa thag
T02D2665:133a-37: pa nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2665:133a-38: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2665:133a-39: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba thog ma
T02D2665:133a-40: ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe
T02D2665:133a-41: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang bdag gis bgyid
T02D2665:133b-0: pa dang @133b bgyid du stsal ba dang rjes su
T02D2665:133b-1: yi rang ba dang de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
T02D2665:133b-2: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la so sor bshags
T02D2665:133b-3: so zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2665:133b-4: de nas skyabs su 'gro ba ni /
T02D2665:133b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2665:133b-6: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D2665:133b-7: nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar
T02D2665:133b-8: du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs
T02D2665:133b-9: su mchi'o // bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2665:133b-10: pa'i zhi ba'i chos kyi sku so so rang gis
T02D2665:133b-11: rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D2665:133b-12: phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa byang chub
T02D2665:133b-13: sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su
T02D2665:133b-14: mchi'o zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2665:133b-15: de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gi ngo bo dbul te /
T02D2665:133b-16: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag
T02D2665:133b-17: la dgongs su gsol bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
T02D2665:133b-19: nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar
T02D2665:133b-20: du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
T02D2665:133b-21: la bdag gi ngo bo dus thams cad du yong
T02D2665:133b-22: ye 'bul gyis thugs rje chen po rnams kyis bdag
T02D2665:133b-23: ba zhes shig ces lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2665:133b-24: de nas sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la
T02D2665:133b-25: snying rje chen po mngon du bya ste byang chub
T02D2665:133b-26: kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa ni /
T02D2665:133b-27: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2665:133b-28: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang
T02D2665:133b-29: khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D2665:133b-30: rnam par spangs pa chos bdag med pa mnyam pa
T02D2665:133b-31: nyid kyis rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes
T02D2665:133b-32: pa / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub
T02D2665:133b-33: sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub kyi snying po
T02D2665:133b-34: la bzhugs kyi bar du ji ltar byang chub tu
T02D2665:133b-35: sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes
T02D2665:133b-36: bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D2665:133b-37: nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar
T02D2665:133b-38: du byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes lan gsum
T02D2665:133b-39: du brjod do // de nas bsod nams gyi rjes
T02D2665:133b-40: su yi rang ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2665:133b-41: sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D2665:134a-0: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi @134a * //
T02D2665:134a-1: rjes su yi rang ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2665:134a-2: 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du
T02D2665:134a-3: bdag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D2665:134a-4: cad dang 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2665:134a-5: nyan thos rnams dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod
T02D2665:134a-6: nams la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes lan gsum
T02D2665:134a-7: du brjod do // de nas gsol ba gdab pa
T02D2665:134a-8: ni sems can gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas
T02D2665:134a-9: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos chos kyi char
T02D2665:134a-10: dbab pa dang thabs dang tshul sna tshogs kyis 'gro
T02D2665:134a-11: ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing rtag tu bzhugs
T02D2665:134a-12: par gsol zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2665:134a-13: de nas sems can la phan pa bstabs pa ni
T02D2665:134a-14: sems can thams cad ngan pa'i mtha' dbugs ma phyin
T02D2665:134a-15: pa so so'i skye bo'i gnas myur du spangs te
T02D2665:134a-16: bde ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i 'jig
T02D2665:134a-17: rten las 'das pa'i lam thob par gyur cig /
T02D2665:134a-18: dam pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyang de'i gong
T02D2665:134a-19: nas gong du 'phar ba'i khyad par thob nas bla
T02D2665:134a-20: na med pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba la gzhol
T02D2665:134a-21: bar gyur cig ces lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2665:134a-22: de nas sems can thams cad la bdag gi bsod nams bsngo ba ni /
T02D2665:134a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i
T02D2665:134a-24: bsod nams kyi bsngo ba ji ltar mkhyen pa de
T02D2665:134a-25: bzhin du bdag gis bsod nams ma lus pa yang
T02D2665:134a-26: sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i bde ba ma
T02D2665:134a-27: thob pa rnams bla na med pa'i bde ba thob
T02D2665:134a-28: par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o zhes lan gsum
T02D2665:134a-29: du brjod do // phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa
T02D2665:134a-30: 'di rnams ci nus pa las gzhan du yang rung
T02D2665:134a-31: du brjod do // ngo // de ltar bsam pa
T02D2665:134a-32: yongs su sbyangs pa nges pa theg pa chen po
T02D2665:134a-33: las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir skyil
T02D2665:134a-34: mo krung bcas te dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya
T02D2665:134a-35: la sogs pas byin gyis brlab pa cho ga 'di
T02D2665:134a-36: du brjod do // ngo // bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2665:134a-37: de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya ni thal
T02D2665:134a-38: mo sbyar te mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ngo //
T02D2665:134a-39: phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te /
T02D2665:134a-40: sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyi yin //
T02D2665:134a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2665:134a-42: phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas //
T02D2665:134a-44: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:134a-45: aa sa me tri sa mes ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:134a-46: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya bdag rnam
T02D2665:134a-47: par dag par bya ba ni lag pa gnyis khu
T02D2665:134a-48: tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug ste
T02D2665:134b-1: de ni chos kyi dbyings gyi phyag rgya ste sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D2665:134b-2: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:134b-3: dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'tma konyham /
T02D2665:134b-4: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2665:134b-5: ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rgyab sprod du
T02D2665:134b-6: bsnol la mthe bo gnyis kyang sprad do //
T02D2665:134b-7: rgya mchog dpal dang ldan pa ni //
T02D2665:134b-8: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba yin //
T02D2665:134b-9: 'jig rten mgon po skyong ba yi //
T02D2665:134b-12: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D2665:134b-14: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so //
T02D2665:134b-15: yi ge ri dkar po yang spyi bor bsam mo //
T02D2665:134b-16: de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar bsngags na go bgos par 'gyur ro//
T02D2665:134b-17: thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab
T02D2665:134b-18: tu sbyar mthe bo gnyis gung mo la gzhar ro
T02D2665:134b-19: // rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya ste de'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D2665:134b-20: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D2665:134b-22: de nas bgegs thams cad rnam par sel ba ma
T02D2665:134b-23: bzod pa rig sngags chen mo rjes su dran par
T02D2665:134b-24: bya ba'i phyag rgya ni thal mo sbyar la mdzub
T02D2665:134b-25: mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis
T02D2665:134b-26: rtse sprad srin lag gnyis brkyad mthe'u chung gnyis cung
T02D2665:134b-27: zad bkug pa 'di ni srung ba chen mo'i phyag
T02D2665:134b-29: na ma ssarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
T02D2665:134b-30: sarba bha ya bi ga te bhyo /
T02D2665:134b-32: sarba th'a ham kham raksha ma h'a ba la sarba
T02D2665:134b-33: ta th'a ga ta pu n+ya ni rdz'a te h'um
T02D2665:134b-34: h'um tra ta tra ta aa pra ti ha te
T02D2665:134b-35: sv'a h'a / bgegs dang ngan khrid thams cad dang //
T02D2665:134b-36: srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams //
T02D2665:134b-37: 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2665:134b-39: de nas sems mnyam par gzhag ste mdun du rgya
T02D2665:134b-40: mtsho chen po bsams la de'i dbus nas ri rab
T02D2665:134b-41: gru bzhi lham pa byung ba'i steng na rin po
T02D2665:134b-42: che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na
T02D2665:134b-43: padma'i seng ge'i gang na chen po padma'i gang na
T02D2665:134b-44: chung du mang pos bskor bar bsam mo //
T02D2665:134b-45: de la rgya mtsho chen po la sogs ji ltar
T02D2665:134b-46: bsams pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur bar sngags 'dis
T02D2665:134b-49: aom a'a:na ma ssarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2665:134b-51: sarba th'a bam aungga te spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:134b-52: de ltar na de dag thams cad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:134b-53: yang na nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig sngags kyis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:135a-0: padma'i seng ge'i gdan de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rnam @135a * //
T02D2665:135a-1: par snang mdzad gser gyi kha dog thor tshugs dang
T02D2665:135a-2: dbu rgyan dang cod pan can dar la'i stod g-yogs
T02D2665:135a-4: sh'akya thub pa cha byad dang kha dog dang dbyibs ji skad du grags pa'ang rung ste /
T02D2665:135a-5: 'gro ba mang po la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa
T02D2665:135a-6: 'od 'phro ba mang pos mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten
T02D2665:135a-7: gyi khams rab tu gsal bar snang ba sems can
T02D2665:135a-8: gyi khams re ba ji lta ba bzhin du mgu
T02D2665:135a-9: bar mdzad pa skyil mo krung bcas te ting nge
T02D2665:135a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas logs kyi padma
T02D2665:135a-12: la spyan ras gzigs dbang po g-yon gyi padma la
T02D2665:135a-13: rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2665:135a-14: bdag gi lha yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun g-yas
T02D2665:135a-15: logs kyi padma la bzhugs par bsam khor khor yug
T02D2665:135a-16: gi padma gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
T02D2665:135a-17: dge 'dun phyir mi ldog pa gzhan la phan 'dogs
T02D2665:135a-18: par mdzad pa la thogs pa med pa'i mthu brnyes
T02D2665:135a-19: pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur
T02D2665:135a-20: mdzad pa rnams bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2665:135a-21: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu dang /
T02D2665:135a-22: bdag gi lha dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2665:135a-23: bdag gi lha rdo rje 'dzin yin na g-yas su
T02D2665:135a-24: bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po g-yon
T02D2665:135a-25: du gzhag go // yang na lha rnams dgod pa'i
T02D2665:135a-26: rim pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang rung ngo
T02D2665:135a-27: du gzhag go // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2665:135a-28: rnam par snang mdzad kyi yi ge bkod pas bzhag
T02D2665:135a-29: du gzhag go // // pa ni / na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am aa /
T02D2665:135a-30: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i yi ge ni bha ste /
T02D2665:135a-31: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am bha /
T02D2665:135a-32: de bzhin du spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i ni /
T02D2665:135a-33: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am sa /
T02D2665:135a-35: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am ba /
T02D2665:135a-36: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni /
T02D2665:135a-37: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am ka / bdag gis
T02D2665:135a-38: lha yang de'i yi ge dang yin pas gzhag go
T02D2665:135a-39: // yang na byang chub sems dpa'i yi ges gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2665:135a-40: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchong
T02D2665:135a-41: ba bya ba'i phyir bdag las kyi rdo rje sems
T02D2665:135a-42: dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2665:135a-43: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am ba /
T02D2665:135a-44: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2665:135a-45: thams cad la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya gong
T02D2665:135b-0: de'i sngags lan gsum bzlas na @135b sangs rgyas dang
T02D2665:135b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig gzigs pas mnyes
T02D2665:135b-2: te gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzhed pas sngags pa
T02D2665:135b-3: ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du byin gyis
T02D2665:135b-4: brlab bo // de nas 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i
T02D2665:135b-5: phyag rgya dang sngags lan gsum brjod pas bskrad par
T02D2665:135b-6: brlab bo // bya'o // de nas bdag nyid de
T02D2665:135b-7: bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par bsams
T02D2665:135b-8: la de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi phyi rol
T02D2665:135b-9: du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sngags kyis mtshams gcad
T02D2665:135b-10: par bya ste de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o //
T02D2665:135b-11: lag ba g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo
T02D2665:135b-12: dang gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag dang mthe'u chung
T02D2665:135b-13: gnyis kyi rtser mthe bos mnan /
T02D2665:135b-14: lag pa g-yas pa'ang de bzhin du byas la mdzub
T02D2665:135b-15: mo dang gung mo gnyis g-yon pa'i mthil du gzhug
T02D2665:135b-16: go // mi g-yo mgon gi phyag rgya ral gri shugs su bcug pa ste sngags ni /
T02D2665:135b-17: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D2665:135b-18: aa tsa la k'a na tsanda ma h'a ro sha na spo ta ya h'um trag ham mam /
T02D2665:135b-20: ral gri shubs nas phyung la bskrad pa ni g-yon nas bskor /
T02D2665:135b-21: mtshams gcad pa ni g-yas nas bskor ro //
T02D2665:135b-22: de bzhin du 'di las gzhan dag dang gzhan dag kyang ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
T02D2665:135b-23: sku gzugs sam mchod rten yod na dang bo nyid
T02D2665:135b-24: du chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i chus
T02D2665:135b-25: bkrus la de nas gdod 'di dag kun bya'o //
T02D2665:135b-26: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la
T02D2665:135b-27: btsugs te spyi bo btud la yon chab dang por
T02D2665:135b-28: gsol nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod de /
T02D2665:135b-29: yon chab la sogs pa de dag kyang 'phags pa
T02D2665:135b-30: mi g-yo ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i chu 'am chos
T02D2665:135b-31: kyi dbyings kyi yi ge gzhag pa'i chus gtor te
T02D2665:135b-32: sbyangs la mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang so so'i sngags
T02D2665:135b-33: kyis lan gsum du btab ste /
T02D2665:135b-34: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ibrjod cing dbul lo //
T02D2665:135b-35: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2665:135b-36: 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
T02D2665:135b-37: pa la sogs pa de dag gi mtshan na smos
T02D2665:135b-38: la ji skad du bsgrags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2665:135b-39: chen po rnams la mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2665:135b-40: yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D2665:136a-0: cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas thams @136a
T02D2665:136a-1: * // cad la khyab pa'i yid kyis mchod pa'i yo byad rnams re re nas dbul lo //
T02D2665:136a-2: de la mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ni thal mo khong stod du sbyar ba'o //
T02D2665:136a-3: yon chab dang spos la sogs pa'i sngags ni 'di rnams so //
T02D2665:136a-4: na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:136a-5: ga ga na sa m'a sa ma sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136a-8: bi shuddhi ga ga na sa dhodbha ba sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136a-10: na ma ssa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:136a-11: ma h'a mee try'a dbhu ta ga ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136a-13: na ma ssa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:136a-14: dharma dha tv'a nu ga te sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136a-16: na ma ssa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:136a-17: ta th'a ga ta aa rtsa spa ra na aa bh'a ba sa ga ga noo d'arya sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136a-19: rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'i yon chab la sogs pa'i
T02D2665:136a-20: sngags kyis btab cing mchod na'ang nyes pa med do
T02D2665:136a-21: // 'dir spos la sogs pa mchod pa rnam bzhi
T02D2665:136a-22: smos pa'am bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i yo byad
T02D2665:136a-23: mtshan ma tsam bstan par zad kyi de kho nar
T02D2665:136a-25: de bas na 'jig rten na bsngags pa'i mchod pa'i
T02D2665:136a-26: yo byad rnams 'byor na 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'am
T02D2665:136a-27: / chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ges bsangs la dbul lo //
T02D2665:136a-28: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams ma 'byor na yang sems
T02D2665:136a-29: rab tu dang bas mchod pa bya ba'i bsam pa
T02D2665:136a-30: bskyed la mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags rnams brjod
T02D2665:136a-31: na thams cad rdzogs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:136a-32: phyogs bcu nas mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang yid kyis dbul bar bya ste de'i thabs kyang 'di'o //
T02D2665:136a-33: phyogs bcu nas sa dang chu las skyes pa'i rin
T02D2665:136a-34: po che dang me tog la sogs pa mdzes pa'i
T02D2665:136a-35: dngos po de rnams kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2665:136a-36: sems dpa' rnams la dbul lo zhes thal mo sbyar
T02D2665:136a-37: la / sems thag pa nas phul na mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:136a-38: de nas yang sbyir por mchod pa'i yul phyogs bcu
T02D2665:136a-39: na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dba'
T02D2665:136a-40: rnams la dus thams cad du rnyed par sla ba
T02D2665:136a-42: rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D2665:136a-43: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang /
T02D2665:136a-44: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang /
T02D2665:136b-0: bdag @136b gi bsod nams dang ye shes dang smon lam gyi mthus /
T02D2665:136b-1: dam pa rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings khyab pa
T02D2665:136b-2: mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang bstod pa dang rgyan
T02D2665:136b-3: dam pa sna tshogs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dang
T02D2665:136b-4: / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du byung zhing /
T02D2665:136b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyis kyad byin
T02D2665:136b-6: gyis brlabs par gyur cig ces brjod cing bsams la
T02D2665:136b-7: mchod pa'i sprin chen po rab tu 'byung par byed
T02D2665:136b-8: pa'i rig sngags chen po 'di lan gsum brjod do
T02D2665:136b-9: // na ma ssa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:136b-10: a'a spa ra ai mam ga ga na kham dha
T02D2665:136b-11: rma dh'a ta ksha ra sa ma t'a ya sarba
T02D2665:136b-13: bar shata manda la ma ma pra ni dhi pu n+ya dzny'a na pa len /
T02D2665:136b-14: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shtha ne na tsa sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:136b-15: de ltar mchod pa chen bo'i sprin de bzhin gshegs
T02D2665:136b-16: pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de
T02D2665:136b-17: bzhin du gnas par 'gyur bar yid ches par bya'o
T02D2665:136b-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2665:136b-19: myur du 'grub par byed pa rdo rje 'dzin gyi
T02D2665:136b-20: glu'i bstod pa dam pa 'dis kyang dus gsum pa'i
T02D2665:136b-21: sangs rgyas rnams la bstod par bya'o //
T02D2665:136b-22: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can //
T02D2665:136b-23: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
T02D2665:136b-24: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad stsol //
T02D2665:136b-25: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med dam chos can //
T02D2665:136b-26: yon tan phra mo'i cha la'ang mtha' med de //
T02D2665:136b-27: nam mkha' dang yang mnyam pa'i dper mi rung //
T02D2665:136b-28: rtag tu sems can rnams la grub mchog stsol //
T02D2665:136b-29: dpe dang bral ba'i dngos grub mtha' yas rnams //
T02D2665:136b-30: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D2665:136b-31: smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can //
T02D2665:136b-32: 'gro ba'i don sgrub brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa //
T02D2665:136b-33: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par yang //
T02D2665:136b-34: mtha' yas dpag med go 'phang rab brnyes kyang //
T02D2665:136b-35: khams gsum kun tu dngos grub mchog stsol la //
T02D2665:136b-36: thugs rje sbyod pa mi g-yo rgyun mi gcod //
T02D2665:136b-37: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid can //
T02D2665:136b-38: mgon po dus gsum gshegs shing sgrib med pa //
T02D2665:136b-39: rtag tu khams gsum kun la mchog sbyin grub //
T02D2665:136b-40: mchog sbyin mchog gi gnas ni rab brnyes pa //
T02D2665:136b-41: dam tshig mchog gsum grub pa bdag la stsol //
T02D2665:137a-1: bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
T02D2665:137a-2: la skyabs su mchis kyis bdag la thugs rjes gzigs
T02D2665:137a-3: te / 'gro ba ma lus pa yongs su bskyab
T02D2665:137a-4: pa'i mthu bdag la stsol cig ces kyang brjod do
T02D2665:137a-5: te / // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams klas
T02D2665:137a-6: pa ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur
T02D2665:137a-7: bar bya ste de'i cho ga ni 'di'o //
T02D2665:137a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i phyogs bcu thams
T02D2665:137a-9: cad du dam pa rgya chen po sems can gyi
T02D2665:137a-10: don mdzad pa kha ton dang tshul dang sbyod lam
T02D2665:137a-11: rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan ba kun tu bzang
T02D2665:137a-12: po sbrul ba mang po rab tu 'byung bar gyur
T02D2665:137a-13: cig / des kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyi
T02D2665:137a-14: nang gi mi bde ba thams cad rab tu zhi
T02D2665:137a-15: zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu
T02D2665:137a-16: bsngags pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa
T02D2665:137a-17: ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang
T02D2665:137a-18: de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces bsams nas
T02D2665:137a-19: / byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2665:137a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang /
T02D2665:137a-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang /
T02D2665:137a-22: bdag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir /
T02D2665:137a-23: sngar bsam pa'i don de dag thams cad sems can
T02D2665:137a-24: gyi khams 'dir ji ltar rigs par myur du 'byung
T02D2665:137a-25: bar gyur cig ces brjod do //
T02D2665:137a-26: de nas sems can gyi don gyi byin gyis rlob
T02D2665:137a-27: pa'i rig sngags nam mkha'i mjod 'byung par mdzad pa
T02D2665:137a-29: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bi shva
T02D2665:137a-30: mu khe bhya: sarba th'a kham audga te spha ra
T02D2665:137a-31: na ai mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:137a-32: 'di lan gsum bzlas pas ji ltar bsams pa'i don
T02D2665:137a-33: rnams sems can gyi khams 'dir de bzhin du 'gyur
T02D2665:137a-34: bar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T02D2665:137a-35: mkhyen gyi / gzhan shes pa chung ngu rnams kyis
T02D2665:137a-36: ni mi shes so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D2665:137a-37: mkhyen gyi / te / de bas na byang chub
T02D2665:137a-38: sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ying ches par
T02D2665:137a-39: mkhyen gyi / te / bya'o // de ltar de
T02D2665:137a-40: bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byas shing 'gro ba ma
T02D2665:137a-41: lus ba'i don byas pa des bdag gis lha'i phyag
T02D2665:137a-42: rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa la sogs
T02D2665:137a-43: pas bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgyur la yi ge ham
T02D2665:137a-44: dkar po yang spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02D2665:137b-0: @137b mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsams la
T02D2665:137b-1: der yi ge sbyar ba byas te dbugs dang dran
T02D2665:137b-2: pa rab tu bsngams nas slar sdud pa'i tshig gis
T02D2665:137b-5: mi drag mi ngal bar ma skyo ba'am ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2665:137b-6: slob dpon dbang bskur bas ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur te /
T02D2665:137b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'am byang chub sems dpa'i sngags
T02D2665:137b-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas bzlas bar bya'o
T02D2665:137b-9: // ji skad du bshad pa ltar ma nus na
T02D2665:137b-10: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D2665:137b-11: phyag 'tshal bar dmigs pa'i sems sam ;
T02D2665:137b-12: / sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la
T02D2665:137b-13: rjes su yi rang bar dmigs shing bzlas par bya'o
T02D2665:137b-14: // de nas ngal lam gtong 'dod na bzlas pa btang ste /
T02D2665:137b-15: yang las kyi rdo rjer bdag bsgyur la snga ma
T02D2665:137b-16: bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2665:137b-17: la bstod cing mchod pa byas la /
T02D2665:137b-18: dge ba ci byas yongs su bsngos la bdag kyang
T02D2665:137b-19: dge ba'i las 'dis sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems
T02D2665:137b-20: can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol nus
T02D2665:137b-21: par gyur cig / bdag nam sangs rgyas kyi bar
T02D2665:137b-22: du yang skyes so cog tu byang chub kyi sems
T02D2665:137b-23: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bdag gi ngo bo
T02D2665:137b-24: dang / 'khor dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang longs
T02D2665:137b-25: spyod phun sum tshogs par shog shig ces brjod do
T02D2665:137b-26: dang / // de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2665:137b-27: chub sems dpa' skyong ba rnams bdag theg pa chen
T02D2665:137b-28: po las mi nyams shing khyad par thob par byin
T02D2665:137b-29: gyis rlob shig ces gsol ba bya'o //
T02D2665:137b-30: de nas yon chab phul te /
T02D2665:137b-31: gdon mi za bar bdag la yang //
T02D2665:137b-32: rjes su gzung par dgongs nas su //
T02D2665:137b-33: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2665:137b-34: ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02D2665:137b-35: de nas sbyi bor dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya
T02D2665:137b-36: byas te gyen du dkrol nas sngar dam tshig gi
T02D2665:137b-37: phyir zhugs pa rnams gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:137b-38: mtshams bcad ba'ang yid kyis dgrol lo //
T02D2665:137b-39: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag chos
T02D2665:137b-40: kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje sems
T02D2665:137b-41: dpa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis bdag rdo rje sems
T02D2665:138a-2: sbyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'ang bsam mo //
T02D2665:138a-3: rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas go cha yang bgos
T02D2665:138a-4: la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
T02D2665:138a-5: yid la byas nas dge ba'i las dam pa bya
T02D2665:138a-7: langs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston
T02D2665:138a-8: pa'i mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba dag lha
T02D2665:138a-9: la sogs pa gnyer te chos sbyin pa'i sems kyis
T02D2665:138a-10: bklag go // de nas lus gso ba'i phyir zas bza' ba'i rim pa'ang 'di'o //
T02D2665:138a-11: dang por ci 'byor pa'i zas la sngags lan gsum nam bdun du gdab po //
T02D2665:138a-12: na ma ssa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2665:138a-13: aom aa mi todbha ba sv'a h'a /
T02D2665:138a-14: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phud phul te /
T02D2665:138a-15: de'i 'og tu sems can la yang byin la ro
T02D2665:138a-16: la ma chags par rigs pa dang ran par bza'o
T02D2665:138a-17: // de nas 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la drag
T02D2665:138a-18: po gdon mi za ba'i snying pos zas kyi lhag
T02D2665:138a-19: ma'i chang bu la btab ste dbul lo //
T02D2665:138a-21: na ma ssa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D2665:138a-22: tra ta aa mo gha tsanda ma h'a rosha na spho ta ya h'um tra ta ya ham mam /
T02D2665:138a-23: gdon mi za bar drag po'i snying po'o //
T02D2665:138a-24: de ltar byas na de mnyes nas rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:138a-25: de nas zas zos te ngal bso nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2665:138a-26: sdig pa bshags la sogs pa de bzhin du bya
T02D2665:138a-27: ste dam pa'i chos kun du dga' bar gnas so
T02D2665:138a-28: // de'i phyi dro 'ang bzlas pa'i cho ga snga
T02D2665:138a-29: ma bzhin du byas nas srod dang tho rangs la
T02D2665:138a-30: dam pa'i chos la brtson par bya ste nam gyi
T02D2665:138a-31: gung la mal sa bcas par sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2665:138a-32: chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag kun gyis
T02D2665:138a-33: // phyag 'tshal nas / byang chub kyi sems rin po che rjes su dran par byas te /
T02D2665:138a-34: khams snyoms par bya ba'i phyir nyal gyi gnyid kyi bde ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T02D2665:138a-35: snga glo g-yas pas nyal na phyis ni ci bder ro //
T02D2665:138a-36: de nas phyi de nyin yang cho ga de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2665:138a-37: de ltar sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod pas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o //
T02D2665:138a-38: ji skad bshad pa bzhin mi nus na yang ci
T02D2665:138a-39: nus pas sngags kyi lha mnyes par bya'i mi rung
T02D2665:138a-40: snyam pa'i dogs pa ni mi bskyed do //
T02D2665:138b-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' @138b rnams rjer bzung ba dang /
T02D2665:138b-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2665:138b-2: chub tu smon lam gdab pa 'di gnyis ni yongs
T02D2665:138b-4: 'di gnyis yongs su ma btang na cho ga gzhan
T02D2665:138b-5: rnams ma nus kyang bzlas pa rtag par brtson 'grus
T02D2665:138b-6: su byas na das kyang rjes su mthun pa'i dngos
T02D2665:138b-8: 'di la nang gi gtsang sbra gtso bo ste de
T02D2665:138b-9: bas na phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra la chags par
T02D2665:138b-10: mi bya'o // bza' ba 'dres pa la sogs pa nyes pa'i dogs pa yang mi bya'o //
T02D2665:138b-11: lus gso ba'i phyir ni phyi rol gyi khrus la sogs pa yang bya ste /
T02D2665:138b-12: de'ang 'bab chu la sogs par khrus byed 'dod na
T02D2665:138b-13: thog mar 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i sngags kyis sa
T02D2665:138b-14: gtsang ma blangs te lan gsum bsngags la sngags des
T02D2665:138b-15: bdag bsrungs la chu'i gdug pa 'ang bskrad de /
T02D2665:138b-16: mtshams bcad la sngags de chu la'ang bsngags te ;
T02D2665:138b-17: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang
T02D2665:138b-18: mang du phul nas yid la dran par byed cing
T02D2665:138b-19: / sa des ya rabs kyi tshul bzhin khrus bya'o //
T02D2665:138b-20: de nas dam tshig la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsum
T02D2665:138b-21: po byas la chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge 'ang
T02D2665:138b-22: sbyi bor bsam / rdo rje go chas kyang bdag
T02D2665:138b-23: go bgos la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2665:138b-24: rnams la phyag phul te sems can la phan par
T02D2665:138b-25: bsngags pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te ldang ngo //
T02D2665:138b-26: mtshams bcad pa'ang yid kyis dkrol la gnas su mi g-yeng bar 'gro'o //
T02D2665:138b-27: yang na khrus kyi gnas de nyid du snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'o //
T02D2665:138b-28: nyin re zhing rjes su dran pa de ltar byas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D2665:138b-29: go 'phang dam pa ring por mi thogs par 'thob
T02D2665:138b-30: cing tshe 'di nyid la 'tshe ba thams cad med
T02D2665:138b-31: pa dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub thams cad nus par myur du 'gyur ro //
T02D2665:138b-32: mtshan ma med pa zab ces te //
T02D2665:138b-33: dman pa rnams kyis mi lcogs pas //
T02D2665:138b-34: de phyir mtshan ma cho ga can //
T02D2665:138b-35: skyon med pa ni 'dir bshad do //
T02D2665:138b-36: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho
T02D2665:138b-37: ga / slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa
